title: Senate condemns Harnai Attack, offers prayers for martyred security personnel
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 17 (APP):The Senate on Monday strongly condemned the terrorist attack in Harnai and offered prayers for the security personnel who embraced martyrdom.
Senator Dost Muhammad highlighted the tragic incident in which ten laborers were killed and eight others injured. The victims, belonging to Shangla and Swat, were coal miners.
Chairman Senate directed Senator Shahadat Awan to lead the prayer for the departed souls.
The House expressed solidarity with the families of the victims and called for enhanced security measures to protect laborers working in vulnerable regions.
